Line1.FB4C9: Please. Help an injured man repay a debt.
Line10.FB4C9: The one named Asyfa carried me here. She gave me my life. I want to give her this amulet in return. (sniff) Ah, a paltry repayment, but it’s all I have. She’ll be back at their camp, west of Caldeum.
Line5.FB4C9: Bandits mugged me. Crushed my knee. I would’ve died, if the Iron Wolves hadn’t stepped in.
